price: Ko za njega ne bude mario, na Sudnjem danu će, doista, teško breme ponijeti,
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: man aʿraḍa ʿanhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawma al-qiyāmati wiz'ran
